titleStmt.title: A very mery and pleasaunt historie done not long since, in this realm of England written in Latine by Erasmus of Roterodame, dialoguewise, vnder the title of A coniuration or spirite ; newly translated into English, by Thomas Iohnson.
titleStmt.author: Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536.
Johnson, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henrie Bynneman, for William Pickring,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: lacks all but four leaves of signature A.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
